== possible pic == http://www.bbc.co.uk/arts/yourpaintings/paintings/hms-alexander-commanded-by-captain-rodney-bligh-shortly-be42777
Author died 1879
Â©[[User:Geni|Geni]] 05:49, 15 October 2011 (UTC)
== Notice == This is just a notice to any one interested in this article that I will be developing a fully explained and sourced version of this article in my userpace over the next week or so, to be uploaded here once complete. It will be loosely based on the current text, but will be extensively sourced, expanded and rewritten. I note that there has been no serious activity on this page, but should any one have any comments, requests or questions then please notify me at my talk page and I will do my best to respond and incorporated the results into the finished article. Regards--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 19:58, 8 April 2012 (UTC) ::The new article is now up: a few notes 1) I had to copy and paste the new text in - for the sequence of revisions I made to the new draft, see the redirect [[User:Jackyd101/Action of 6 November 1794]]. 2) Because I don't speak French and have no access to French sources, the article is based primarily on British sources which for this action, are fairly vague on detail. I am aware that the previous version of the article made use of the French account [http://echo.levillage.org/303/5927.cbb here], which as best as I can translate differs from the British versions in the identities of the ships that attacked ''Alexander'' and the number of French casualties (the British reckoning of French losses in this action is totally absurd - there is no way French losses could plausibly be that high without one of the ships exploding). If someone can provide reliable French sources on this subject (I don't know if that website is reliable) I would be very pleased to incorporate them into the article. Regards--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 09:54, 10 April 2012 (UTC) :::Found one - much more reliable casualty figures used--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 14:17, 28 April 2012 (UTC)
